full_summary:
```markdown
# Siding Installation for Building # 40
### Tender Reference Number: PW-22-01008574
#### Solicitation Number: 01B46-22-109
#### Publication Date: 2022-09-28
#### Tender Closing Date and Time: 2022-10-26 14:00:00
#### Amendment Date and Number: 2022-10-19, Amendment 3

### Overview
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is soliciting tenders for the installation of metal siding and hardware for Building # 40, located at the St-John’s Research and Development Centre.

### Contract Details
- **Contract Value:** Not disclosed
- **Tender Period:** October 28, 2022 - November 12, 2022
- **Bidder Requirements:**
    - Bidders must obtain the related specifications, plans, and drawings, and all other tender documents through the BuyandSell service provider’s platform.
    - Firms must contact the AAFC Contract Officer for any inquiries and information requests.
    - Non-compliance with this requirement may result in the Group’s proposal being disqualified.

### Site Visit
A mandatory site visit is scheduled for October 3, 2022, at 10:00 am ATL, to familiarize bidders with the project location and site conditions. Participation is not mandatory, but bidders are strongly encouraged to attend.

### Evaluation Criteria
Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation. The AAFC Contract Officer reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part, without prior negotiation, and reject any or all proposals received.

### Contact Information
- **Contract Officer:** Jacques Toussaint
- **Email:** jacques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 438-455-8237

### Tender Documents
Tender documents, including addenda, are available at the following URLs:
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/a94a81d3d984622632df7657f25d6a31/invitation_to_tender_01b46-22-109_.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/12/43e5fff5137f6f48caa4110bb928fe04/addendum_.pdf
- https://
